name: eBrandz Inc.
tagline: Helping Businesses Grow without Breaking theirBank
description:
eBrandz is a digital marketing agency headquartered in Mumbai with offices in New York, Puerto Rico, Sydney and other major cities globally. With over 13 years of experience, we have successfully executed more than 40,000 search engine marketing campaigns worldwide.

Our core services include Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Pay Per Click (PPC), Social Media Marketing, Web Design & Development and Affiliate Marketing. Our customers are typically SEO and digital marketing agencies looking to expand their business by providing their client's excellent services. We help them create and deliver better digital marketing experience for their clients.
What agencies and clients love the most is our transparency. When our team works on their projects, they can track each and every activity and their status via our proprietary dashboard we have created with years of experience. Clients can track rankings, local visibility, calls, leads, website traffic, social media performance, business reviews, work activities and other vital stats - all from a single place. The best things is, the sites are crawled automatically every week and clients get notified if the site goes down of if any codes go missing. And with the mobile app, clients can also check the dashboard on the move.
We have more than 600 agencies actively using our dashboard - This itself signifies the success we have had with the dashboard.
Apart from this, we have been regularly rewarded in the search industry for our software and services. This year itself, we have won 4 major awards at different search industry events for our mobile app and our services.
